imdb.plot outline: The in-depth journalism of Videonews for Quarto Grado focuses on the criminal cases of current news and recent years with interviews and insights, cases who have passionate and divide the public opinion, with particular attention from the point of view of the victim. Quarto Grado is characterized by its multidisciplinary content also thanks to the intervention in the debates in the study of some experts in the various fields of scientific interest and other professionals in the field of forensic science (anthropology, forensic medicine, IT, telecommunications), as well as lawyers and exponents of the journalistic world. The basic scheme consists in discussing with the experts and the protagonists of the events of judicial reporting.
imdb.title: Quarto grado
